import React, { Component } from "react"; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css'; import { Segment, Grid, Header, List, Table, Form } from "semantic-ui-react"; import Nav from "../../components/shared/Nav"; import SubNav from "./SubNav"; import Editor from "./componentFour/editor"; import "../shared/layout.css"; // import _ from 'lodash' class AgilePage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {}; this.handleItemClick = this.handleItemClick.bind(this); } handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render() { return (
General Introduction

The main objective of this module is to enable participants to experience the challenges of problem-solving and innovation through an agile, flexible and team-based approach.

At the end of the module, participants would be able

Experience the context of challenges in the work environment, resolve at least one problem and suggest an innovation or prototype solution to overcome the problem. Use the vehicle of empathy, person-centred and lean management approaches to understand stakeholders’ interests in solving the problem.
Describe your Job Description?

Identify the purpose of your role, key tasks, and main accountabilities of your job.

Summarise how the needs of the various features of the IEA system are attended to through the partnership.

IEA Features How are the needed IEA Features Attended To? Price Affordability Price Affordability Community Services Risk and Security Concerns Compliance Regulations
Submit
); } } export default AgilePage;
